verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Condemned are the hands of Abee Lahab, and he is condemned.
verse.verse_2: His wealth did not avail him, nor did what he acquired.
verse.verse_3: He will burn in a Flaming Fire.
verse.verse_5: Around her neck is a rope of thorns.
